fusilli.fusion_models.denoise_tab_img_maps.ImgUnimodalDAEïƒ

class ImgUnimodalDAE(data_dims, pred_type, multiclass_dims)[source]ïƒ

Bases: LightningModule

Image unimodal network to go alongside the tabular denoising autoencoder: pytorch lightning module.

img_dimïƒ

Dimension of the input image data.

Type:

int

multiclass_dimïƒ

Number of classes for multiclass classification.

Type:

int

Image layers.

Type:

nn.ModuleDict

num_layersïƒ

Number of image layers.

Type:

int

fused_dimïƒ

Dimension of the fused layers. Final dimension of the image data after image layers.

Type:

int

Type of prediction.

Type:

str

Type:

Type:
